about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Hello there!
about.description: My name is Laurens De Maeyer, I was born in 'Oost-Vlaanderen', Belgium in 2001. Currently, I'm working as a Business Analyst at Delaware Consulting. I studied Applied Informatics at HOGent. I started studying this course in 2021 and finished in 2024. Before I started studying Applied Informatics, I studied Chemistry at the same college. I have a deep passion for programming and I'm always eager to learn new things. Currently my main focus is on software development and web development. Mainly I'm working with the following technologies: javascript/typescript, java, html, css, Android (Kotlin). For the full list of technologies I'm competent in, check out my
about.contact: You can contact me via mail at laurensdm{'@'}outlook.com or through phone at +32 478 77 27 95. Or you can fill out the
about.contactSuffix: at the bottom of the website.
